fields.specifications:
Samsung Galaxy Tab A9 in Kenya

The Samsung Galaxy Tab A9 64GB/4GB is a sleek and powerful tablet that offers a premium user experience. With its 10.1-inch display, you can enjoy stunning visuals and vibrant colors, making it perfect for watching movies, playing games, or browsing the web. The tablet is powered by a fast and efficient octa-core processor, ensuring smooth performance and seamless multitasking.

One of the standout features of the Samsung Galaxy Tab A9 is its long-lasting battery life. With a 6,150mAh battery, you can use the tablet for hours on end without worrying about running out of power. Whether you're traveling, working, or simply relaxing at home, you can rely on the tablet to keep up with your demands.

The Samsung Galaxy Tab A9 also offers a great multimedia experience. It comes with dual speakers that deliver rich and immersive sound, enhancing your movie and gaming experience. The tablet also features a high-resolution camera, allowing you to capture stunning photos and videos. With expandable storage options, you can easily store all your files, photos, and videos without worrying about running out of space.

 

Design

The Samsung Galaxy Tab A9 is your modern version when it comes right down to either communication and bonding effect. This was done by this tablet as it seems to be attracting many people due to its weightless nature hence, portability is assured. You can pick up various colors including silver, black, or blue depending on what tickles your fancy allowing it to be personalized together with moving world class qualities. It has a narrow bezel at the display edge which improves on immersive experience whereby you get an edge-to-edge look maximizing screen space that makes this all engaging visually appealing when streaming movies or videos in internet surfing or during some office tasks.

It also has great performance features that are able to serve both leisure times and productive efforts apart from just its spectacular design. This tablet has a vivid screen that brings images and videos to life. It is best for those who indulge in a lot of media. In addition, it has strong process power and enough storage for multi-tasking, making sure that productivity never gets compromised between any two applications. Furthermore, Samsung Galaxy Tab A9 offers friendly interface with simple navigation; thus, making it usable across all age groups.

Display

The Galaxy Tab A9 has been purposely designed to improve your digital experience by presenting an exquisite 8.7-inch TFT LCD screen with 800 x 1340 pixel resolution. The bright and vivid display is good for watching movies or series, reading e-books, and browsing the internet among others. Because of its impressive clarity, every detail sticks out thus making it possible for one to be engaged for long periods of time when viewing something on it.The tablet’s smooth and reactive scrolling experience means that there will be no issues moving through apps or flipping pages.

Apart from the big screen size, the Galaxy Tab A9 is versatile and convenient to keep it as an ideal companion for both work and play. You can carry this tablet everywhere because of its lightweight design whether in your commute, while travelling around or simply resting at home. It features a powerful battery that gives you more time before needing to recharge thus allowing you to remain connected and entertained all day long.

Build

The Samsung Galaxy Tab A9 is built solidly with aluminum case which provides good appearance as well as makes it able to withstand rough handling. The tablet is well thought-out for hustlers such as those who mix business with pleasure and even wanderers. When digging deeper into their characters users will find it water-resistant up until 50 meters hence making them excuse to travel with these devices anywhere including places where water such as rivers could meet the tablets. In case one finds himself or herself outside in the rain among other things unable to stop them from possessing this out find be concerned since they can take controller outdoors without worrying about getting’re too wet.

In addition to this sturdiness, the Galaxy Tab A9 has an aesthetic design that gives it appeal among all kinds of people. And because it is lightweight and thinly shaped, you can always have it in your hand. Displaying bright images for the visuals are also done perfectly with high resolution. Speaking of which, the device is not only for the beautiful; it can be used in different ways regardless of whether you are streaming videos or browsing the web or even working on office tasks that matter. Offering high performance and simplicity for its users, Samsung Galaxy Tab A9 will satisfy anyone searching for a tablet that serves their needs both design-wise and pragmatically.

fields.name: Samsung Galaxy A36 5G
fields.description:
Samsung Galaxy A36 5G Key Features

RAM: 8GB
Internal Storage: 128GB, 256GB
Display: 7-inch, Super AMOLED
Connectivity: 5G, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth 5.3, NFC
OS: Android 15, up to 6 major Android upgrades, One UI 7
Chipset: Qualcomm SM6475-AB Snapdragon 6 Gen 3 (4 nm
Front Camera: 12MP
Main Camera: 50MP +8MP + 2MP
Battery: 5000mAh, 45W
Colors: Lavender, Black, White, Lime
fields.specifications:
The Samsung Galaxy A36 5G perfectly combines style, performance, and innovation, giving you a premium experience without breaking the bank. Its sleek and lightweight design feels great in your hand, and the modern, linear camera layout adds a touch of sophistication. You can choose from colors like Awesome Graphite, Awesome Lightgrey, Awesome Olive, and Awesome Pink, so there’s something for everyone’s taste.

Under the hood, it’s powered by a robust Octa-core processor, ensuring smooth multitasking, gaming, and media streaming, along with plenty of storage for all your apps, photos, and videos. The 6.5-inch FHD+ Super AMOLED display, equipped with Vision Booster technology, offers stunning visuals with vibrant colors and deep contrasts, making for an immersive viewing experience no matter the lighting.

Running on One UI 7 with Galaxy AI, this phone makes usability a breeze with features like Quick Share for easy file transfers and Smart Switch for hassle-free migration from other devices, including iOS. The camera system is designed for creativity, boasting AI-powered enhancements, Circle to Search with Google, and an Object Eraser to get rid of unwanted elements in your photos.

https://youtu.be/2lmEiM-qLMI?si=NGEJ-3hb9_7yXp

Refined Design and Display

With color options like Awesome Graphite, Awesome Lightgrey, Awesome Olive, and Awesome Pink, there’s a style to suit everyone’s taste.

Made from high-quality materials, the Galaxy A36 5G strikes a perfect balance between sophistication and durability. Its sturdy metal frame and Corning Gorilla Glass provide extra protection against those inevitable drops and scratches, making it a dependable choice for daily use. Plus, the smooth finish and ergonomic curves make it easy to hold, even during long sessions.

Thanks to Vision Booster technology, visibility is enhanced even in bright light, ensuring that everything remains clear and sharp, even when you’re out in the sun. This means you can enjoy your favorite content anywhere, whether you’re inside or outside, without straining your eyes.

Powerful Performance and 5G Connectivity

The Galaxy A36 5G packs a punch with its robust Octa-core processor, making multitasking, gaming, and streaming feel like a breeze. Whether you're flipping between apps or diving into high-performance games, this optimized chipset keeps everything running smoothly without any annoying lag.

Thanks to its 5G connectivity, users can enjoy lightning-fast downloads, crystal-clear video calls, and streaming without the dreaded buffering. The enhanced network speeds mean quicker browsing and a more responsive experience for online gaming, so you can stay in the action without missing a beat.

With a variety of storage options, you can pick between 128GB and 256GB of internal space.

Plus, the high-performance cooling system is a game-changer, preventing overheating and keeping things running smoothly even during those marathon gaming sessions or when you're using demanding apps. No matter how long you use it, this phone stays cool and efficient.

Intelligent Camera System

The Galaxy A36 5G boasts a fantastic 48MP main camera that captures sharp, detailed images, making sure every shot pops with clarity and vibrancy. Thanks to Samsung’s AI-powered image processing, the quality gets a nice boost by fine-tuning colors, contrast, and sharpness, giving you that professional touch.

On the other hand, the 8MP front camera is perfect for snapping high-quality selfies and making video calls, ensuring every photo looks clear and natural. With features like AI beautification and HDR support, you can take stunning selfies no matter the lighting.

When it comes to low-light photography, the advanced processing really shines, allowing you to snap bright, noise-free photos even in the dark. The Night Mode feature steps in to enhance exposure and sharpness, so you won’t miss any details in those dimly lit settings.

Plus, there are some cool AI-driven features like Circle to Search with Google, which lets you quickly identify objects, and the Object Eraser tool that helps you remove any unwanted elements from your photos. This makes it super easy to create flawless images without needing any third-party editing apps.

Battery, Security, and Longevity

Whether you’re streaming your favorite shows, diving into a gaming session, or tackling work tasks on the go, this efficient battery life means you won’t be scrambling for a charger every few hours.

With EAL5+ certification, your sensitive information—like passwords and payment details—stays safe from potential threats.

Other Alternative Models

Samsung Galaxy A16 5G

fields.specifications:
The Samsung Galaxy A56 5G is truly a marvel of modern technology, combining a sleek design with impressive performance and smart features that elevate your daily life. Its slim 7.4mm profile and lightweight 198g build make it easy to hold, while the stylish linear camera arrangement gives it a contemporary flair. You can choose from a range of eye-catching colors like Awesome Graphite, Awesome Lightgrey, Awesome Olive, and Awesome Pink, ensuring it looks as good as it performs.

Under the hood, an advanced Octa-core processor powers through multitasking, gaming, and streaming with ease, and you can enjoy up to 256GB of storage for all your favorite media. The 6.7-inch FHD+ Super AMOLED display, boasting a brightness of 1,200 nits with Vision Booster, guarantees stunning visuals even in bright sunlight.

Running on One UI 7 with Galaxy AI, this phone makes everything feel effortless, featuring handy tools like Quick Share for easy file transfers and Smart Switch to simplify moving from iOS. The AI photography capabilities are impressive too, with options like Circle to Search with Google, Object Eraser to eliminate distractions, and custom filters to give your photos a personal touch.  Plus, Enhanced Nightography ensures your low-light shots are sharp and vibrant.

Built for durability, the Galaxy A56 5G sports a sturdy metal frame, Corning Gorilla Glass Victus+, and is IP67 rated for water and dust resistance. With six years of security updates, Knox Vault protection, and a robust 5,000mAh battery that can last up to 29 hours on a single charge, this smartphone is all about reliability, security, and long-lasting performance. It’s the perfect choice for anyone who wants a device that combines style, power, and intelligence seamlessly.

https://youtu.be/Xb9A-35mKU4?si=z1xPndGVsKDEl-Ln

Refreshed Premium Design and Build

The Galaxy A56 5G boasts a sleek and ergonomic design that feels great in your hand, thanks to its slim 7.4mm profile and lightweight 198g frame. Samsung’s linear camera layout adds a modern touch, perfectly blending with the phone’s polished appearance. With a variety of stylish colors like Awesome Graphite, Awesome Lightgrey, Awesome Olive, and Awesome Pink, the Galaxy A56 5G has something for everyone. Its premium build not only ensures durability but also gives it a sophisticated, high-end vibe that matches its advanced features. Samsung has crafted the Galaxy A56 5G to balance style and sturdiness, using Corning Gorilla Glass Victus+ to guard against everyday wear and tear.

Plus, with IP67 water and dust resistance, the Galaxy A56 5G is ready for anything life throws at it—be it spills, splashes, or dust. Whether you’re out on an adventure or navigating a bustling city, this phone is built to last in all sorts of conditions. With its striking design, high-quality materials, and thoughtful construction, the Galaxy A56 5G elevates mid-range smartphones.

fields.specifications:
The Samsung Galaxy A26 5G is built to handle tough conditions, boasting an IP67 rating for dust and water resistance. This means it’s completely shielded from dust and can be submerged in up to one meter of water for 30 minutes without a hitch. With this level of protection, users can feel at ease using their device in all sorts of situations, whether it’s a little spill, unexpected rain, or dusty environments. For those who love outdoor adventures or work in rugged settings, durability is a must. Whether you find yourself caught in a downpour, trekking through challenging landscapes, or just using your phone in a dusty area, the Galaxy A26 5G has got you covered.

This feature not only enhances its lifespan but also minimizes the chances of damage from everyday mishaps. On top of its water and dust resistance, the phone is crafted from high-quality materials that boost its overall toughness. The reinforced chassis and sturdy glass display are designed to resist drops and scratches.

The phone undergoes rigorous testing to ensure it can handle temperature swings, pressure changes, and rough handling, making it a dependable choice for long-term use. This makes the Galaxy A26 5G a smart investment for anyone in need of a smartphone that can stand up to various environmental challenges. In the end, the combination of the IP67 rating and Samsung’s solid design philosophy makes the Galaxy A26 5G a tough and trustworthy smartphone. Whether you’re in a humid climate, a dusty job site, or out exploring the great outdoors, this phone is built to last, giving you peace of mind and excellent protection for your investment.

Software

The Samsung Galaxy A26 5G comes with Android 15 right out of the box, which is the latest version of Google’s mobile operating system. This means users can enjoy the newest security updates, system improvements, and all the fresh features that Android has to offer. With Android 15, you can look forward to better privacy controls, enhanced notifications, and an overall smoother experience. On top of Android 15, you’ll find Samsung’s One UI 7, which gives you a personalized and user-friendly interface. One UI 7 is celebrated for its sleek design, easy navigation, and a settings menu packed with features. Samsung has fine-tuned the software to ensure everything runs smoothly, making multitasking a breeze and allowing for easy one-handed use. It’s a great fit for both tech lovers and everyday users alike.

The software also boasts Samsung’s signature features, like Samsung Knox for top-notch security, Samsung DeX for a desktop-like experience, and Edge Panels for quick access to your favorite apps and tools. This means the Galaxy A26 5G will stay relevant and secure as time goes on. Users can look forward to bug fixes, UI tweaks, and new features in future updates. Samsung has also added some AI-powered features in One UI 7 to elevate the user experience. This includes AI-generated summaries, smart app recommendations, and tools for optimizing battery life. These enhancements make for a fast, smooth, and future-ready smartphone experience, making the Galaxy A26 5G an attractive option for anyone who appreciates a modern and feature-rich interface.

fields.name: Samsung Galaxy Tab S10 FE
fields.description: RAM: 8GB Internal Storage: 128GB, 256GB Chipset: Exynos 1580 (4 nm) Display: 9 inches, 90Hz Connectivity: Bluetooth 5.3, 5G, Wi-Fi, NFC Battery: Li-Po 8000 mAh, 45W wired, QC2.0 Colors: Silver, Gray, Blue.
fields.specifications:
Premium Design with Sleek and Modern Aesthetics

The Samsung Galaxy Tab S10 FE boasts a refined, premium design that reflects Samsung’s commitment to elegance and durability. Its slim profile makes it comfortable to hold, while the lightweight build ensures effortless portability for both work and leisure. The smooth metallic finish gives it a high-end look, making it suitable for professional settings and casual use alike. This tablet is designed to blend style and functionality seamlessly.

Its minimal bezels and sleek edges enhance the immersive display experience while keeping the device compact. The precision-cut aluminum body provides structural strength, ensuring it can withstand the demands of daily use. The finish resists fingerprints and smudges, allowing the tablet to maintain a pristine appearance even after extended handling. This is a device that looks as good as it performs.

Available in multiple color options, the Galaxy Tab S10 FE caters to different style preferences. Whether you prefer a sophisticated graphite tone, a calming pastel, or a vibrant shade, there’s a variant that matches your personality. Samsung’s careful attention to color harmony ensures each option feels both modern and timeless.

The tablet’s balanced weight distribution makes it easy to hold for extended periods without fatigue, whether you’re reading, sketching, or watching movies. Its form factor also makes it easy to slip into a backpack, briefcase, or handbag, making it a travel-friendly device that’s always ready when you are.

The Galaxy Tab S10 FE’s design incorporates strategically placed buttons and ports for convenience. USB-C connectivity, speaker grills, and volume controls are positioned for intuitive access, enhancing usability. The tablet also features a magnetic area for securely attaching the S Pen, ensuring it’s always within reach.

Ultimately, the Galaxy Tab S10 FE offers a premium, thoughtfully crafted design that balances elegance with everyday practicality, making it a perfect companion for both productivity and entertainment.

 Large Immersive Display for Work and Play

One of the Galaxy Tab S10 FE’s most impressive features is its expansive display, delivering vibrant visuals and exceptional clarity. The large screen provides ample real estate for multitasking, whether you’re editing documents, creating digital art, or enjoying high-definition content. Samsung’s advanced display technology ensures bright, sharp, and color-accurate visuals in any lighting condition.

The high-resolution panel makes movies, games, and photos come to life with vivid colors and deep contrasts. Whether you’re streaming a TV series, playing graphics-rich games, or reviewing creative projects, the viewing experience remains immersive and visually pleasing. The wide viewing angles ensure clarity even when sharing the screen with others.

Adaptive brightness automatically adjusts screen levels based on your surroundings, reducing eye strain and improving comfort during long sessions. This makes the tablet ideal for students, professionals, and artists who spend hours working or studying on-screen.

The display’s smooth refresh rate ensures fluid motion, whether you’re scrolling through web pages, sketching with the S Pen, or playing fast-paced games. This responsiveness is particularly valuable for digital artists, as it enables natural and precise input when drawing or writing.

For multitasking, Samsung’s split-screen and multi-window features take full advantage of the display size. You can run multiple apps side by side, making it easier to research, communicate, and create without constantly switching between windows.

In summary, the Galaxy Tab S10 FE’s display transforms every activity into a visually rich and engaging experience, making it a versatile tool for productivity, creativity, and entertainment.

 Powerful Performance with Smooth Multitasking

The Samsung Galaxy Tab S10 FE is powered by a high-performance processor designed to handle demanding tasks with ease. Whether you’re running productivity apps, engaging in creative workflows, or playing graphically intensive games, the tablet delivers smooth and responsive performance. The processor works in harmony with ample RAM to ensure fast app launches and seamless multitasking.

Samsung’s software optimization further enhances performance by efficiently managing resources. This allows you to switch between multiple applications without lag, making the device a productivity powerhouse for students, professionals, and creators alike. The tablet’s hardware is built to support both everyday tasks and intensive workloads without slowing down.

Gaming enthusiasts will appreciate the tablet’s ability to handle modern mobile games with rich graphics and complex mechanics. The smooth gameplay and minimal load times make it a portable gaming solution for on-the-go entertainment. Paired with the immersive display, it creates an engaging and dynamic experience.

fields.name: Samsung Galaxy S25 FE 5G
fields.description:
Samsung Galaxy S25 FE 5G Key Features

Display: 6.7-inch, Dynamic AMOLED 2X
RAM: 8GB
Internal Storage: 256GB
OS: Android 16, One UI 8
Chipset: Exynos 2400e (4 nm) / MediaTek Dimensity 9400
Main Camera: 50MP+8MP+12MP
Selfie Camera: 12MP
Connectivity: 5G, Wi-Fi 6e, Bluetooth 5.4, NFC, USB-C, GPS
Battery: 4900mAh, 45W
Colors: IcyBlue, Jetblack, White, Navy.
fields.specifications:
Design and DisplayThe Samsung Galaxy S25 FE 5G showcases an elegant and modern design that delivers a perfect balance between beauty and practicality. It features a premium aluminium frame with Gorilla Glass protection on both sides, ensuring durability while maintaining a sleek and lightweight feel in the hand. The flat edges and thin bezels provide a refined look that aligns with Samsung’s flagship standards, giving the phone a professional yet stylish appearance. The build quality reflects Samsung’s commitment to creating phones that look and feel premium, even in the Fan Edition lineup.

Its 6.7-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display offers stunning colour accuracy and brightness, delivering a vivid and immersive viewing experience. With a 120Hz adaptive refresh rate, scrolling and animations appear exceptionally smooth whether browsing or gaming. The high-resolution panel ensures crisp detail, making videos and images come alive with remarkable clarity. This display also supports HDR10+, ensuring deeper contrasts and more realistic tones in supported content. Combined with Samsung’s excellent outdoor visibility, users enjoy great performance in both bright sunlight and low-light conditions.

The phone’s symmetrical design emphasises simplicity, with the camera array seamlessly blending into the back for a clean finish. Available in various elegant color options, the Galaxy S25 FE 5G allows users to express personality without sacrificing sophistication. The IP68 water and dust resistance rating adds peace of mind for everyday use, making it suitable for both professional and active lifestyles.

 Performance and SoftwareAt the core of the Galaxy S25 FE 5G lies a 4nm Exynos 2400 processor (or Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 FE in select regions), designed to deliver high efficiency and power. This cutting-edge chipset handles multitasking, gaming, and demanding applications with ease, ensuring consistent speed and responsiveness. The 8GB or 12GB of LPDDR5X RAM allows seamless switching between apps and sustained performance, even during heavy workloads. Users can expect flagship-level capabilities for productivity and entertainment alike.

The phone comes with up to 256GB of UFS 4.0 storage, offering ample space for apps, photos, and videos while delivering ultra-fast data transfer speeds. This ensures minimal loading times and smoother operation, even with resource-intensive apps. Paired with Samsung’s advanced cooling technology, the Galaxy S25 FE 5G maintains optimal performance during extended gaming or 4K video recording sessions.

Running on Android 16 with One UI 8.0, the device offers a smooth, intuitive interface filled with customization options and AI-driven enhancements. Samsung’s promise of up to seven years of OS and security updates guarantees long-term reliability, allowing users to keep their device current for years. The inclusion of Galaxy AI features such as live translation, circle-to-search, and intelligent photo editing further enhances productivity and convenience.

Camera SystemThe Galaxy S25 FE 5G brings flagship-level camera technology to a more affordable price segment, boasting a triple rear camera setup. The main 50MP wide sensor with optical image stabilisation ensures sharp, vibrant photos even in low light. The 12MP ultra-wide camera captures stunning landscapes and group shots, while the 8MP telephoto lens provides up to 3x optical zoom for detailed distant shots. Together, these sensors deliver versatility for any photographic situation, maintaining clarity and color accuracy across all modes.

Samsung’s AI-powered image processing enhances every photo, optimising colour balance, exposure, and detail automatically. Night mode has been refined to capture well-lit, low-noise images even in challenging lighting conditions. Portrait shots benefit from natural depth effects, while Pro Mode allows experienced photographers to fine-tune ISO, shutter speed, and white balance manually.

Video recording performance is equally impressive, supporting up to 8K resolution at 24fps and 4K at 60fps. With features such as Super Steady stabilization and HDR recording, videos remain smooth and vivid even during motion. The 12MP front camera delivers sharp selfies and excellent video call quality, supported by AI facial optimisation that enhances skin tones naturally. The Galaxy S25 FE 5G redefines what a Fan Edition camera can achieve.

 Battery and ChargingEquipped with a large 4,900mAh battery, the Galaxy S25 FE 5G provides all-day power for streaming, gaming, and productivity. The phone’s adaptive power management intelligently adjusts performance to extend usage, ensuring energy efficiency without sacrificing speed. Whether using 5G, the high refresh rate display, or demanding applications, the battery is built to last through busy schedules.

Charging is equally efficient, with 45W Super Fast Charging support that can power the device from 0% to over 60% in about 30 minutes when using a compatible charger

fields.description:
Samsung Galaxy S25 FE 5G Key Features

Display: 6.7-inch, Dynamic AMOLED 2X
RAM: 8GB
Internal Storage: 256GB
OS: Android 16, One UI 8
Chipset: Exynos 2400e (4 nm) / MediaTek Dimensity 9400
Main Camera: 50MP+8MP+12MP
Selfie Camera: 12MP
Connectivity: 5G, Wi-Fi 6e, Bluetooth 5.4, NFC, USB-C, GPS
Battery: 4900mAh, 45W
Colors: IcyBlue, Jetblack, White, Navy.
fields.specifications:
Design and DisplayThe Samsung Galaxy S25 FE 5G showcases an elegant and modern design that delivers a perfect balance between beauty and practicality. It features a premium aluminium frame with Gorilla Glass protection on both sides, ensuring durability while maintaining a sleek and lightweight feel in the hand. The flat edges and thin bezels provide a refined look that aligns with Samsung’s flagship standards, giving the phone a professional yet stylish appearance. The build quality reflects Samsung’s commitment to creating phones that look and feel premium, even in the Fan Edition lineup.

Its 6.7-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display offers stunning colour accuracy and brightness, delivering a vivid and immersive viewing experience. With a 120Hz adaptive refresh rate, scrolling and animations appear exceptionally smooth whether browsing or gaming. The high-resolution panel ensures crisp detail, making videos and images come alive with remarkable clarity. This display also supports HDR10+, ensuring deeper contrasts and more realistic tones in supported content. Combined with Samsung’s excellent outdoor visibility, users enjoy great performance in both bright sunlight and low-light conditions.

The phone’s symmetrical design emphasises simplicity, with the camera array seamlessly blending into the back for a clean finish. Available in various elegant color options, the Galaxy S25 FE 5G allows users to express personality without sacrificing sophistication. The IP68 water and dust resistance rating adds peace of mind for everyday use, making it suitable for both professional and active lifestyles.

 Performance and SoftwareAt the core of the Galaxy S25 FE 5G lies a 4nm Exynos 2400 processor (or Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 FE in select regions), designed to deliver high efficiency and power. This cutting-edge chipset handles multitasking, gaming, and demanding applications with ease, ensuring consistent speed and responsiveness. The 8GB or 12GB of LPDDR5X RAM allows seamless switching between apps and sustained performance, even during heavy workloads. Users can expect flagship-level capabilities for productivity and entertainment alike.

The phone comes with up to 256GB of UFS 4.0 storage, offering ample space for apps, photos, and videos while delivering ultra-fast data transfer speeds. This ensures minimal loading times and smoother operation, even with resource-intensive apps. Paired with Samsung’s advanced cooling technology, the Galaxy S25 FE 5G maintains optimal performance during extended gaming or 4K video recording sessions.

Running on Android 16 with One UI 8.0, the device offers a smooth, intuitive interface filled with customization options and AI-driven enhancements. Samsung’s promise of up to seven years of OS and security updates guarantees long-term reliability, allowing users to keep their device current for years. The inclusion of Galaxy AI features such as live translation, circle-to-search, and intelligent photo editing further enhances productivity and convenience.

Camera SystemThe Galaxy S25 FE 5G brings flagship-level camera technology to a more affordable price segment, boasting a triple rear camera setup. The main 50MP wide sensor with optical image stabilisation ensures sharp, vibrant photos even in low light. The 12MP ultra-wide camera captures stunning landscapes and group shots, while the 8MP telephoto lens provides up to 3x optical zoom for detailed distant shots. Together, these sensors deliver versatility for any photographic situation, maintaining clarity and color accuracy across all modes.

Samsung’s AI-powered image processing enhances every photo, optimising colour balance, exposure, and detail automatically. Night mode has been refined to capture well-lit, low-noise images even in challenging lighting conditions. Portrait shots benefit from natural depth effects, while Pro Mode allows experienced photographers to fine-tune ISO, shutter speed, and white balance manually.

Video recording performance is equally impressive, supporting up to 8K resolution at 24fps and 4K at 60fps. With features such as Super Steady stabilization and HDR recording, videos remain smooth and vivid even during motion. The 12MP front camera delivers sharp selfies and excellent video call quality, supported by AI facial optimisation that enhances skin tones naturally. The Galaxy S25 FE 5G redefines what a Fan Edition camera can achieve.

 Battery and ChargingEquipped with a large 4,900mAh battery, the Galaxy S25 FE 5G provides all-day power for streaming, gaming, and productivity. The phone’s adaptive power management intelligently adjusts performance to extend usage, ensuring energy efficiency without sacrificing speed. Whether using 5G, the high refresh rate display, or demanding applications, the battery is built to last through busy schedules.

Charging is equally efficient, with 45W Super Fast Charging support that can power the device from 0% to over 60% in about 30 minutes when using a compatible charger

fields.name: Samsung Galaxy Tab S10 FE
fields.description: RAM: 8GB Internal Storage: 128GB, 256GB Chipset: Exynos 1580 (4 nm) Display: 9 inches, 90Hz Connectivity: Bluetooth 5.3, 5G, Wi-Fi, NFC Battery: Li-Po 8000 mAh, 45W wired, QC2.0 Colors: Silver, Gray, Blue.
fields.specifications:
Premium Design with Sleek and Modern Aesthetics

The Samsung Galaxy Tab S10 FE boasts a refined, premium design that reflects Samsung’s commitment to elegance and durability. Its slim profile makes it comfortable to hold, while the lightweight build ensures effortless portability for both work and leisure. The smooth metallic finish gives it a high-end look, making it suitable for professional settings and casual use alike. This tablet is designed to blend style and functionality seamlessly.

Its minimal bezels and sleek edges enhance the immersive display experience while keeping the device compact. The precision-cut aluminum body provides structural strength, ensuring it can withstand the demands of daily use. The finish resists fingerprints and smudges, allowing the tablet to maintain a pristine appearance even after extended handling. This is a device that looks as good as it performs.

Available in multiple color options, the Galaxy Tab S10 FE caters to different style preferences. Whether you prefer a sophisticated graphite tone, a calming pastel, or a vibrant shade, there’s a variant that matches your personality. Samsung’s careful attention to color harmony ensures each option feels both modern and timeless.

The tablet’s balanced weight distribution makes it easy to hold for extended periods without fatigue, whether you’re reading, sketching, or watching movies. Its form factor also makes it easy to slip into a backpack, briefcase, or handbag, making it a travel-friendly device that’s always ready when you are.

The Galaxy Tab S10 FE’s design incorporates strategically placed buttons and ports for convenience. USB-C connectivity, speaker grills, and volume controls are positioned for intuitive access, enhancing usability. The tablet also features a magnetic area for securely attaching the S Pen, ensuring it’s always within reach.

Ultimately, the Galaxy Tab S10 FE offers a premium, thoughtfully crafted design that balances elegance with everyday practicality, making it a perfect companion for both productivity and entertainment.

 Large Immersive Display for Work and Play

One of the Galaxy Tab S10 FE’s most impressive features is its expansive display, delivering vibrant visuals and exceptional clarity. The large screen provides ample real estate for multitasking, whether you’re editing documents, creating digital art, or enjoying high-definition content. Samsung’s advanced display technology ensures bright, sharp, and color-accurate visuals in any lighting condition.

The high-resolution panel makes movies, games, and photos come to life with vivid colors and deep contrasts. Whether you’re streaming a TV series, playing graphics-rich games, or reviewing creative projects, the viewing experience remains immersive and visually pleasing. The wide viewing angles ensure clarity even when sharing the screen with others.

Adaptive brightness automatically adjusts screen levels based on your surroundings, reducing eye strain and improving comfort during long sessions. This makes the tablet ideal for students, professionals, and artists who spend hours working or studying on-screen.

The display’s smooth refresh rate ensures fluid motion, whether you’re scrolling through web pages, sketching with the S Pen, or playing fast-paced games. This responsiveness is particularly valuable for digital artists, as it enables natural and precise input when drawing or writing.

For multitasking, Samsung’s split-screen and multi-window features take full advantage of the display size. You can run multiple apps side by side, making it easier to research, communicate, and create without constantly switching between windows.

In summary, the Galaxy Tab S10 FE’s display transforms every activity into a visually rich and engaging experience, making it a versatile tool for productivity, creativity, and entertainment.

 Powerful Performance with Smooth Multitasking

The Samsung Galaxy Tab S10 FE is powered by a high-performance processor designed to handle demanding tasks with ease. Whether you’re running productivity apps, engaging in creative workflows, or playing graphically intensive games, the tablet delivers smooth and responsive performance. The processor works in harmony with ample RAM to ensure fast app launches and seamless multitasking.

Samsung’s software optimization further enhances performance by efficiently managing resources. This allows you to switch between multiple applications without lag, making the device a productivity powerhouse for students, professionals, and creators alike. The tablet’s hardware is built to support both everyday tasks and intensive workloads without slowing down.

Gaming enthusiasts will appreciate the tablet’s ability to handle modern mobile games with rich graphics and complex mechanics. The smooth gameplay and minimal load times make it a portable gaming solution for on-the-go entertainment. Paired with the immersive display, it creates an engaging and dynamic experience.

fields.name: Samsung Galaxy A26 5G
fields.description:
Samsung Galaxy A26 5G Key Features

RAM: 6GB, 8GB
Internal Storage: 128GB, 256GB
Display: 6.7-inch, Super AMOLED
Connectivity: 5G, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth 5.3, NFC
OS: Android 15, up to 6 major Android upgrades, One UI 7
Chipset: Exynos 1380 (5 nm)
Front Camera: 13MP
Main Camera: 50MP +8MP + 2MP
Battery: 5000mAh, 25W
Colors: Black, White, Mint, Peach Pink
fields.specifications:
The Samsung Galaxy A26 5G is built to handle tough conditions, boasting an IP67 rating for dust and water resistance. This means it’s completely shielded from dust and can be submerged in up to one meter of water for 30 minutes without a hitch. With this level of protection, users can feel at ease using their device in all sorts of situations, whether it’s a little spill, unexpected rain, or dusty environments. For those who love outdoor adventures or work in rugged settings, durability is a must. Whether you find yourself caught in a downpour, trekking through challenging landscapes, or just using your phone in a dusty area, the Galaxy A26 5G has got you covered.

This feature not only enhances its lifespan but also minimizes the chances of damage from everyday mishaps. On top of its water and dust resistance, the phone is crafted from high-quality materials that boost its overall toughness. The reinforced chassis and sturdy glass display are designed to resist drops and scratches.

The phone undergoes rigorous testing to ensure it can handle temperature swings, pressure changes, and rough handling, making it a dependable choice for long-term use. This makes the Galaxy A26 5G a smart investment for anyone in need of a smartphone that can stand up to various environmental challenges. In the end, the combination of the IP67 rating and Samsung’s solid design philosophy makes the Galaxy A26 5G a tough and trustworthy smartphone. Whether you’re in a humid climate, a dusty job site, or out exploring the great outdoors, this phone is built to last, giving you peace of mind and excellent protection for your investment.

Samsung Galaxy A26 5G Technical Specifications and Prices in Kenya

Brand

Samsung

Model

Galaxy A26 5G

Body

 	Size: 164 x 77.5 x 7.7 mm (6.46 x 3.05 x 0.30 in)

 	Weight: 200g

 	Build: Glass front (Gorilla Glass Victus+), plastic frame, glass back (Gorilla Glass Victus+)

 	SIM: Nano-SIM + Nano-SIM

 	IP67 dust/water resistant (up to 1m for 30 min)

Display

 	Type: Super AMOLED, 120Hz

 	Size: 6.7 inches, 110.2 cm2 (~86.7% screen-to-body ratio)

 	Resolution: 1080 x 2340 pixels, 19.5:9 ratio (~385 ppi density)

 	Protection: Corning Gorilla Glass Victus+

 	Always-on display

Camera Specs

Selfie lens:

 	13 MP, f/2.2, (wide), 1/3.06″, 1.12µm

 	Video     1080p@30fps

Main Camera:

 	50 MP, f/1.8, 27mm (wide), 1/2.76″, 0.64µm, PDAF, OIS

 	8 MP, f/2.2, 120˚ (ultrawide), 1/4″, 1.12µm

 	2 MP, f/2.4, (macro)

 	Features: LED flash, panorama, HDR

 	Video: 4K@30fps, 1080p@30fps, 720p@480fps, gyro-EIS

Audio Support

 	Loudspeaker: Yes

 	3.5mm jack: No

Network

 	Technology: GSM / HSPA / LTE / 5G

 	2G bands: GSM 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900

 	3G bands: HSDPA 850 / 900 / 1700(AWS) / 1900 / 2100

 	4G bands: 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 7, 8, 12, 17, 20, 26, 28, 32, 38, 40, 41, 66

 	5G bands: 1, 3, 5, 7, 8, 20, 28, 38, 40, 41, 66, 77, 78 SA/NSA/Sub6

 	Speed: HSPA, LTE, 5G

Communication and Connectivity Support

 	WLAN: Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac, dual-band, Wi-Fi Direct

 	Bluetooth: 5.3, A2DP, LE

 	Positioning: GPS, GALILEO, GLONASS, BDS, QZSS

 	NFC: Yes (market/region dependent)

 	Radio: Unspecified

 	USB: Type-C 2.0, OTG

Sensors

 	Fingerprint (side-mounted), accelerometer, gyro, compass

 	Virtual proximity sensing

 	Circle to Search

Battery

 	Type: 5000 mAh

 	Charging: 25W wired

Software

The Samsung Galaxy A26 5G comes with Android 15 right out of the box, which is the latest version of Google’s mobile operating system. This means users can enjoy the newest security updates, system improvements, and all the fresh features that Android has to offer. With Android 15, you can look forward to better privacy controls, enhanced notifications, and an overall smoother experience. On top of Android 15, you’ll find Samsung’s One UI 7, which gives you a personalized and user-friendly interface. One UI 7 is celebrated for its sleek design, easy navigation, and a settings menu packed with features. Samsung has fine-tuned the software to ensure everything runs smoothly, making multitasking a breeze and allowing for easy one-handed use. It’s a great fit for both tech lovers and everyday users alike.

The software also boasts Samsung’s signature features, like Samsung Knox for top-notch security, Samsung DeX for a desktop-like experience, and Edge Panels for quick access to your favorite apps and tools. This means the Galaxy A26 5G will stay relevant and secure as time goes on. Users can look forward to bug fixes, UI tweaks, and new features in future updates. Samsung has also added some AI-powered features in One UI 7 to elevate the user experience. This includes AI-generated summaries, smart app recommendations, and tools for optimizing battery life. These enhancements make for a fast, smooth, and future-ready smartphone experience, making the Galaxy A26 5G an attractive option for anyone who appreciates a modern and feature-rich interface.

Its slim 7.4mm profile and lightweight 198g build make it easy to hold, while the stylish linear camera arrangement gives it a contemporary flair. With a variety of stylish colors like Awesome Graphite, Awesome Lightgrey, Awesome Olive, and Awesome Pink, the Galaxy A56 5G has something for everyone. Its premium build not only ensures durability but also gives it a sophisticated, high-end vibe that matches its advanced features. Samsung has crafted the Galaxy A56 5G to balance style and sturdiness, using Corning Gorilla Glass Victus+ to guard against everyday wear and tear.

Plus, with IP67 water and dust resistance, the Galaxy A56 5G is ready for anything life throws at it—be it spills, splashes, or dust. Whether you’re out on an adventure or navigating a bustling city, this phone is built to last in all sorts of conditions. With its striking design, high-quality materials, and thoughtful construction, the Galaxy A56 5G elevates mid-range smartphones.

fields.name: Samsung Galaxy A36 5G
fields.description:
Samsung Galaxy A36 5G Key Features

RAM: 8GB
Internal Storage: 128GB, 256GB
Display: 7-inch, Super AMOLED
Connectivity: 5G, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth 5.3, NFC
OS: Android 15, up to 6 major Android upgrades, One UI 7
Chipset: Qualcomm SM6475-AB Snapdragon 6 Gen 3 (4 nm
Front Camera: 12MP
Main Camera: 50MP +8MP + 2MP
Battery: 5000mAh, 45W
Colors: Lavender, Black, White, Lime
fields.specifications:
The Samsung Galaxy A36 5G perfectly combines style, performance, and innovation, giving you a premium experience without breaking the bank. Its sleek and lightweight design feels great in your hand, and the modern, linear camera layout adds a touch of sophistication. You can choose from colors like Awesome Graphite, Awesome Lightgrey, Awesome Olive, and Awesome Pink, so there’s something for everyone’s taste.

Under the hood, it’s powered by a robust Octa-core processor, ensuring smooth multitasking, gaming, and media streaming, along with plenty of storage for all your apps, photos, and videos. The 6.5-inch FHD+ Super AMOLED display, equipped with Vision Booster technology, offers stunning visuals with vibrant colors and deep contrasts, making for an immersive viewing experience no matter the lighting.

Running on One UI 7 with Galaxy AI, this phone makes usability a breeze with features like Quick Share for easy file transfers and Smart Switch for hassle-free migration from other devices, including iOS. The camera system is designed for creativity, boasting AI-powered enhancements, Circle to Search with Google, and an Object Eraser to get rid of unwanted elements in your photos.

https://youtu.be/2lmEiM-qLMI?si=NGEJ-3hb9_7yXp

Refined Design and Display

With color options like Awesome Graphite, Awesome Lightgrey, Awesome Olive, and Awesome Pink, there’s a style to suit everyone’s taste.

Made from high-quality materials, the Galaxy A36 5G strikes a perfect balance between sophistication and durability. Its sturdy metal frame and Corning Gorilla Glass provide extra protection against those inevitable drops and scratches, making it a dependable choice for daily use. Plus, the smooth finish and ergonomic curves make it easy to hold, even during long sessions.

Thanks to Vision Booster technology, visibility is enhanced even in bright light, ensuring that everything remains clear and sharp, even when you’re out in the sun. This means you can enjoy your favorite content anywhere, whether you’re inside or outside, without straining your eyes.

Powerful Performance and 5G Connectivity

The Galaxy A36 5G packs a punch with its robust Octa-core processor, making multitasking, gaming, and streaming feel like a breeze. Whether you're flipping between apps or diving into high-performance games, this optimized chipset keeps everything running smoothly without any annoying lag.

Thanks to its 5G connectivity, users can enjoy lightning-fast downloads, crystal-clear video calls, and streaming without the dreaded buffering. The enhanced network speeds mean quicker browsing and a more responsive experience for online gaming, so you can stay in the action without missing a beat.

With a variety of storage options, you can pick between 128GB and 256GB of internal space.

Plus, the high-performance cooling system is a game-changer, preventing overheating and keeping things running smoothly even during those marathon gaming sessions or when you're using demanding apps. No matter how long you use it, this phone stays cool and efficient.

Intelligent Camera System

The Galaxy A36 5G boasts a fantastic 48MP main camera that captures sharp, detailed images, making sure every shot pops with clarity and vibrancy. Thanks to Samsung’s AI-powered image processing, the quality gets a nice boost by fine-tuning colors, contrast, and sharpness, giving you that professional touch.

On the other hand, the 8MP front camera is perfect for snapping high-quality selfies and making video calls, ensuring every photo looks clear and natural. With features like AI beautification and HDR support, you can take stunning selfies no matter the lighting.

When it comes to low-light photography, the advanced processing really shines, allowing you to snap bright, noise-free photos even in the dark. The Night Mode feature steps in to enhance exposure and sharpness, so you won’t miss any details in those dimly lit settings.

Plus, there are some cool AI-driven features like Circle to Search with Google, which lets you quickly identify objects, and the Object Eraser tool that helps you remove any unwanted elements from your photos. This makes it super easy to create flawless images without needing any third-party editing apps.

Battery, Security, and Longevity

Whether you’re streaming your favorite shows, diving into a gaming session, or tackling work tasks on the go, this efficient battery life means you won’t be scrambling for a charger every few hours.

With EAL5+ certification, your sensitive information—like passwords and payment details—stays safe from potential threats.

Other Alternative Models

Samsung Galaxy A16 5G

fields.name: Samsung Galaxy Tab A9
fields.description:
Samsung Galaxy Tab A9 features and specifications in Kenya

RAM: 4GB
Storage: 64GB, 128GB
Chipset: Mediatek Helio G99 (6nm)
Display: 8.7-inch TFT LCD
Resolution: 800 x 1340 pixels
Main Camera: 8 MP
Selfie Camera: 2 MP
Battery: 5,100 mAh
Colors: Graphite, Silver, Navy
OS: Android 13, One UI 5.1
fields.specifications:
Samsung Galaxy Tab A9 in Kenya

The Samsung Galaxy Tab A9 64GB/4GB is a sleek and powerful tablet that offers a premium user experience. With its 10.1-inch display, you can enjoy stunning visuals and vibrant colors, making it perfect for watching movies, playing games, or browsing the web. The tablet is powered by a fast and efficient octa-core processor, ensuring smooth performance and seamless multitasking.

One of the standout features of the Samsung Galaxy Tab A9 is its long-lasting battery life. With a 6,150mAh battery, you can use the tablet for hours on end without worrying about running out of power. Whether you're traveling, working, or simply relaxing at home, you can rely on the tablet to keep up with your demands.

The Samsung Galaxy Tab A9 also offers a great multimedia experience. It comes with dual speakers that deliver rich and immersive sound, enhancing your movie and gaming experience. The tablet also features a high-resolution camera, allowing you to capture stunning photos and videos. With expandable storage options, you can easily store all your files, photos, and videos without worrying about running out of space.

 

Design

The Samsung Galaxy Tab A9 is your modern version when it comes right down to either communication and bonding effect. This was done by this tablet as it seems to be attracting many people due to its weightless nature hence, portability is assured. You can pick up various colors including silver, black, or blue depending on what tickles your fancy allowing it to be personalized together with moving world class qualities. It has a narrow bezel at the display edge which improves on immersive experience whereby you get an edge-to-edge look maximizing screen space that makes this all engaging visually appealing when streaming movies or videos in internet surfing or during some office tasks.

It also has great performance features that are able to serve both leisure times and productive efforts apart from just its spectacular design. This tablet has a vivid screen that brings images and videos to life. It is best for those who indulge in a lot of media. In addition, it has strong process power and enough storage for multi-tasking, making sure that productivity never gets compromised between any two applications. Furthermore, Samsung Galaxy Tab A9 offers friendly interface with simple navigation; thus, making it usable across all age groups.

Display

The Galaxy Tab A9 has been purposely designed to improve your digital experience by presenting an exquisite 8.7-inch TFT LCD screen with 800 x 1340 pixel resolution. The bright and vivid display is good for watching movies or series, reading e-books, and browsing the internet among others. Because of its impressive clarity, every detail sticks out thus making it possible for one to be engaged for long periods of time when viewing something on it.The tablet’s smooth and reactive scrolling experience means that there will be no issues moving through apps or flipping pages.

Apart from the big screen size, the Galaxy Tab A9 is versatile and convenient to keep it as an ideal companion for both work and play. You can carry this tablet everywhere because of its lightweight design whether in your commute, while travelling around or simply resting at home. It features a powerful battery that gives you more time before needing to recharge thus allowing you to remain connected and entertained all day long.

Build

The Samsung Galaxy Tab A9 is built solidly with aluminum case which provides good appearance as well as makes it able to withstand rough handling. The tablet is well thought-out for hustlers such as those who mix business with pleasure and even wanderers. When digging deeper into their characters users will find it water-resistant up until 50 meters hence making them excuse to travel with these devices anywhere including places where water such as rivers could meet the tablets. In case one finds himself or herself outside in the rain among other things unable to stop them from possessing this out find be concerned since they can take controller outdoors without worrying about getting’re too wet.

In addition to this sturdiness, the Galaxy Tab A9 has an aesthetic design that gives it appeal among all kinds of people. And because it is lightweight and thinly shaped, you can always have it in your hand. Displaying bright images for the visuals are also done perfectly with high resolution. Speaking of which, the device is not only for the beautiful; it can be used in different ways regardless of whether you are streaming videos or browsing the web or even working on office tasks that matter. Offering high performance and simplicity for its users, Samsung Galaxy Tab A9 will satisfy anyone searching for a tablet that serves their needs both design-wise and pragmatically.

Storage: 64GB 4GB RAM

fields.specifications:
Samsung Galaxy Tab A11
Samsung Galaxy Tab A11 price in Kenya is Kes 17,000. The 4G device, released on 12th September 2025, measures 335/337g and weighs 211 x 124.7 x 8 mm. Supporting Nano-SIM, it proves quite versatile for a budget device.

The 8.7-inch TFT display comes with 800 x 1340 pixels, a 5:3 ratio (~179 ppi density) resolution. Though not as supreme as the more premium tablets, it gets the job done when it comes to social media engagement and consumption, general browsing, and research.

Subte Powering Mechanism
Running on Android 15, One UI 7, and powered by Mediatek Helio G99 (6 nm), the A11 is as good as they come for a budget tablet at that price. You get the latest Android apps and UI experience, even though the G99 leaves a lot to be desired when it comes to processing capabilities. Anchored with 64GB 4GB RAM / 128GB 8GB RAM, you can carry through your work and fun without compromise on experience, thanks to ample storage and RAM for that price.

An 8MP primary camera and 5MP selfie lens are quite basic, but fit the purpose and needs of the Galaxy Tab A11. For front selfies, conference calls, scanning documents for official use, and QR codes for smart access to websites and profiles, this is sufficient.

4G Connectivity
As pointed out earlier, the Tab A11 is 4G enabled, supporting Nano-SIM (cellular model only). Enjoy seamless Wi-Fi connectivity thanks to the Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac, dual-band, Wi-Fi Direct. Wirelessly connect to other devices in the Galaxy ecosystem via Bluetooth v5.3, A2DP, LE. GPS? No worries with the accurate GPS, GLONASS, BDS, GALILEO, QZSS package for location and pinpointing places as you explore unfamiliar areas. Notably, Tab A11 does not support NFC or FM Radio.

Powering this budget-friendly, production-inclined device is a 5100mAh battery. Recharge fast with the 15W wired adapter, which comes along with the tablet. Available in Gray and Silver, you will not miss a moment, whether in the office, out in the field, or at home with family and friends as you catch up. Buy the Samsung Galaxy Tab A11 today at Phoneplace Kenya.

Pros and Cons of Galaxy Tab A11
Pros
Affordable price point for a Samsung tablet in the mid-range segment.
Decent performance with MediaTek Helio G99 processor (for the standard A11) — suitable for casual gaming and multitasking.
Expandable storage via microSD card (up to 1TB).
Lightweight and slim design (8mm thickness, ~335g).
Good battery life with 5100mAh (Tab A11) or 7040mAh (Tab A11+) capacity.
Android 15/16 with One UI 7/8, promising up to 7 years of major updates (A11+).
Optional cellular models (LTE/5G) available for A11+.
Stereo speakers for a decent media consumption experience.
USB-C port for modern connectivity and charging.
Cons
Limited to 4G.
Display resolution is modest — 800×1340 pixels on Tab A11 (8.7″) and 1200×1920 on Tab A11+ (11″), both TFT LCD.
No AMOLED or high refresh rate on Tab A11; Tab A11+ has 90Hz but still LCD.
Basic camera setup — 8MP rear, no flash, and limited imaging features.
Slow charging — 15W on Tab A11, 25W on Tab A11+ (still not fast by 2025 standards).
No fingerprint sensor or advanced biometric security.
Plastic build — durable but less premium feel.
Limited RAM on base models — starts at 4GB, which may bottleneck performance over time.

fields.title: Tepstore Privacy Policy
fields.content:
Privacy Policy

Tepstore Africa values your privacy and is committed to protecting any personal information that you share with us. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your information when you visit our website, make a purchase, enroll in a telco contract, or participate in a trade-in program.

When you interact with Tepstore Africa, we may collect personal information including your name, phone number, email address, physical address, identification details where required, device information, and payment-related details. This information is collected when you place an order, register for a warranty, apply for a telco contract, request a trade-in valuation, or communicate with our customer support team.

Your information is used strictly for legitimate business purposes. These purposes include processing and delivering your orders, activating and managing telco contracts, assessing and completing trade-in transactions, registering and managing warranties, providing customer support, and improving our products and services. We may also use your contact details to send important service-related communications such as order confirmations, delivery updates, and warranty notifications.

Tepstore Africa takes reasonable administrative, technical, and physical security measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. While we strive to safeguard your information, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

We do not sell, rent, or trade your personal information to third parties. Your data may only be shared with trusted partners such as payment processors, logistics providers, telco partners, or warranty service providers, strictly for the purpose of fulfilling our services. Information may also be disclosed if required by law or legal process.

You have the right to request access to your personal data, request corrections, or request deletion where applicable. To exercise these rights, you may contact Tepstore Africa through our official communication channels. Continued use of our website and services constitutes acceptance of this Privacy Policy and any updates made to it.

fields.title: Terms of Service
fields.content:
Terms and Conditions

Introduction

These Terms and Conditions govern your access to and use of the Tepstore Africa website and services. By purchasing our products or using our services, you agree to comply with these terms.

Business Scope

Tepstore Africa is engaged in the sale of smartphones, facilitation of telco contracts, and device trade-in services. All products and services are subject to availability and may be updated or modified without prior notice.

Orders and Payments

All orders placed through our platform are subject to confirmation and acceptance by Tepstore Africa. Full payment must be completed before order processing unless otherwise agreed in writing.

Trade-In Services

Trade-in valuations provided are provisional and subject to physical inspection. Tepstore Africa reserves the right to adjust or reject a trade-in if the device condition, authenticity, or functionality differs from what was declared.

Telco Contracts

Telco contracts are subject to approval and terms set by the respective network providers. Tepstore Africa is not responsible for network performance, coverage limitations, or service interruptions.

Limitation of Liability

Tepstore Africa shall not be liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use or inability to use our products or services.

Governing Law

These terms are governed and interpreted in accordance with the laws of Kenya.

fields.title: Shipping policy
fields.content:
Shipping Policy

Order Processing

Once payment is confirmed, Tepstore Africa begins processing your order for dispatch. Orders are prepared with care to ensure safe delivery.

Delivery Timelines

Delivery within major towns typically takes one to three business days, while deliveries outside major towns may take up to five business days. These timelines are estimates and may vary due to logistical factors.

Shipping Charges

Shipping costs are determined by delivery location and will be communicated to you before order confirmation.

Customer Responsibility

Customers are responsible for providing accurate delivery details. Tepstore Africa is not liable for delays or failed deliveries caused by incorrect or incomplete address information.

Delivery Confirmation

Risk of loss or damage transfers to the customer upon successful delivery. Customers are encouraged to inspect items immediately upon receipt.

fields.title: Return Policy
fields.content:
Return Policy

Return Eligibility

Returns are accepted only if a device is defective upon delivery or if an incorrect item was supplied. All return requests must be reported within forty-eight hours of delivery.

Condition of Returned Items

Returned devices must be unused, in original condition, and include all original packaging and accessories. Any signs of damage, misuse, or tampering will void return eligibility.

Non-Returnable Cases

Returns will not be accepted for change of mind, software-related issues, physical damage after delivery, or unauthorized repairs.

Return Assessment

All returned items are subject to inspection. Tepstore Africa reserves the right to approve a replacement, repair, or refund based on the assessment outcome.

Refund Processing

Approved refunds will be processed using the original payment method within a reasonable timeframe.

fields.title: Warranty Policy
fields.content:
Warranty Policy

Warranty Coverage

Tepstore Africa offers a two-year warranty on all smartphones sold. This warranty covers manufacturing defects and hardware faults occurring under normal usage conditions.

Warranty Period

The warranty period begins on the date of purchase and is valid only with proof of purchase issued by Tepstore Africa.

Warranty Exclusions

The warranty does not cover physical damage, liquid damage, power surges, unauthorized repairs, misuse, software issues, or normal wear and tear.

Warranty Claims

Devices submitted for warranty claims will be inspected and tested before approval. Repairs or replacements will be provided at the discretion of Tepstore Africa.

Replacement Policy

If replacement is necessary, Tepstore Africa may replace the device with the same model or an equivalent model of similar value and specifications.

Warranty Limitations

This warranty is non-transferable and applies only to the original purchaser.

fields.title: Cookie Policy
fields.content:
Cookie Policy

Introduction

This Cookie Policy explains how Tepstore Africa uses cookies and similar technologies on its website. By using our website, you agree to the use of cookies in accordance with this policy.

What Cookies Are

Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit a website. They help websites function properly, remember user preferences, and improve overall user experience.

How We Use Cookies

Tepstore Africa uses cookies to ensure the website operates efficiently, to remember your preferences, to understand how visitors interact with our website, and to improve our products and services. Cookies also help us provide a smoother and more personalized browsing experience.

Types of Cookies We Use

We use essential cookies that are necessary for the proper functioning of our website, including enabling core features such as page navigation, secure access, and checkout functionality. We also use performance and analytics cookies to understand how visitors use our website and to help us improve site performance. In addition, functionality cookies may be used to remember user preferences and enhance usability.

Third-Party Cookies

Some cookies on our website may be placed by third-party service providers such as analytics platforms, advertising partners, or payment processors. These third parties may collect information about your online activities over time and across different websites, in accordance with their own privacy policies.

Managing Cookies

You can control or disable cookies through your browser settings at any time. Please note that disabling certain cookies may affect the functionality of the website and limit your ability to access some features or services.

Consent

By continuing to use the Tepstore Africa website, you consent to the placement and use of cookies as described in this policy. Where required by law, we will request your explicit consent before placing non-essential cookies.

Changes to This Policy

Tepstore Africa may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in technology, legal requirements, or our business practices. Any updates will be posted on this page, and continued use of the website constitutes acceptance of the revised policy.

Contact Information

If you have any questions about this Cookie Policy or how we use cookies, you may contact Tepstore Africa through our official communication channels.
